title: The True Tale Of Jezebel Cole (Karen Mason) [PDF/ePub/mobi] HoT
description:
Information
Author: Karen Mason
Genre: Romance / Women's Fiction
Format: PDF / ePub / mobi

Author
Karen Mason was born in 1971 in London. She has written from an early age, brought up by a single mum, money was often
in short supply and a weekend treat was often a choice between some chocolate and an exercise book. Karen usually
chose the exercise book and used it to scribble down all the ideas in her head. Her crowning moment was in 1978 coming
second in the Blue Peter Ã¢â‚¬â„¢Write a Limerick for Goldie the DogÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ contest - winning her a Blue Peter badge. In 1986, influenced by
the trashy but brilliant Return to Eden, Karen and her best friend Cheryl set themselves a challenge to write a blockbuster
novel during the summer holidays. After a few weeks Cheryl had written a paragraph and Karen had written a 250
page novel!

Summary
When world famous writer Patty Belleville goes missing, her daughter embarks on a heart breaking journey to not only
find her mother, but to discover what made her into the woman she became. Along the way Sasha learns a lot about herself,
her mother, and those who mean the most to her.
